hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Tawus, from his father, from Ibn 'Abbas, that the Messenger of Allah said:"The one who takes back his gift, is like the dog which vomits then goes back to its vomit

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى طَاوُسٍ فِي الرَّاجِعِ فِي هِبَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Reports From Tawus About The One Who Takes Back His Gift
